alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Macon; Peach; Talbot; Taylor; Upson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 2:42PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Macon, southeastern Upson, central Peach, southwestern Crawford, southeastern Talbot and Taylor Counties through 315 PM EDT... At 242 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Wesley Church, or 7 miles north of Butler, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Fort Valley, Butler, Roberta, Marshallville, Reynolds, Whitewater State Park, Nakomis, Baldwinville, Garden Valley, Hicks, Potterville, Howard, Powerville, Lee Pope, Salem, Horns, Carsonville, Wesley Church, Bartlett, and Fickling Mill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.

area.areaDesc: Crawford; Macon; Peach; Talbot; Taylor; Upson
